Notes

Filesize: 225.47 MB
Duration: 1:33:51

Track numbering on the label website is wrong. It's missing a listing for track 11 & 21.

Track 1.3 & 1.29: Artist is only credited as "Promo".
Track 1.5: Artist is only credited as "Ryan Elliott".
Track 1.8 is only titled as "Sektor D".
Track 1.28: Artist is only credited as "Demo".
Track 1.35 is only titled as "Drive".
